page.title: 06GARBOLDISHAM CHURCH.
page.content: The Anglican Church of St.John the Baptist, Garboldisham and also four others, are looked after by one Parish Priest. He is also Chaplain of Riddle- worth Hall School. Two voluntary{LAY {PREACHERS}help him with services, visits and pastoral care. Garboldisham has weekly Sunday services led by a good mixed choir that includes some Blo'Norton members. There is a pram and toddler service, a ladies group and a keen team of{BELLRINGERS. There is a valued close contact with the C.of E. Primary School, with the Rector taking weekly assemblies and teaching Scripture to the upper class. There is close, friendly cooperation with the Methodist Chapel, a combined Sunday School and quarterly{UNITED {SERVICES.}Efforts are in hand to raise a considerable sum of money for the repair of the church fabric.
